title: SALE PENDING - T206 Mathewson portrait PSA 5.5 & PSA 6
author: Rhotchkiss

posts.post_title: SALE PENDING - T206 Mathewson portrait PSA 5.5 & PSA 6
posts.post_content:
SALE PENDING (will update if goes through or falls apart). Don't Need Both.  Asking $8,400 for the PSA 6 (just bought in REA) or $6,500 for the PSA 5.5 (all prices net to me and accepting only checks or PayPal FF).

Thanks
PM sent on the PSA 6 portrait Mathewson. Thanks.
